quitString.name: Quit Message

restartString.name: Restart Message
restartString.default: Are you sure you want to restart?

editString.name: Edit Message

name: ConfirmPauseMenu
description: Gives you a dialog to confirm when pushing buttons on the pause menu, like clicking restart says "Are you sure you want to restart?"
